text: Alejandro Velasco Fariñas (born 23 December 1986 in Madrid), known as Jano, is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for CF Fuenlabrada as a defensive midfielder. ==Club career== Born in Madrid, Jano was a CF Rayo Majadahonda youth graduate, and made his first team debut during the 2006–07 season, in Tercera División. In 2008 he joined Segunda División B side CD Leganés, but terminated his contract with the club on 4 September 2009 after appearing rarely, and moved to Rayo Vallecano's B-team in the fourth division. Jano helped Rayo B in their promotion to the third division in 2010, being sparingly used afterwards. He subsequently represented fourth tier side CD Puerta Bonita, but left the club in December 2011 to move to Austrian Football Second League side SKN St. Pölten in the following month. Jano made his professional debut on 2 March 2012, starting and netting his team's second in a 3–2 home win against FC Lustenau 07. A regular starter for the side, he scored the equalizer in the 2013–14 Austrian Cup Final against FC Red Bull Salzburg, but his side went on to lose 2–4. In the summer of 2014, Jano signed for SV Mattersburg, He helped the side achieve promotion to the Austrian Football Bundesliga in his first season, as champions. Jano made his debut in the top tier of Austrian football on 25 July 2015, starting in a 2–1 home win against Salzburg. He scored his first goal in the category on 26 September, netting his team's second in a 2–4 away loss against the very same club. Jano returned to Spain on 5 October 2020, agreeing to a one-year contract with Segunda División side CF Fuenlabrada. ==Honours== Mattersburg *Austrian Football First League: 2014–15 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Spanish footballers Category:Madrilenian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:CF Rayo Majadahonda players Category:CD Leganés players Category:Rayo Vallecano B players Category:CF Fuenlabrada footballers Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga players Category:Austrian Football Second League players Category:SKN St. Pölten players Category:SV Mattersburg players Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Austria
title: Jano (footballer, born 1986)
